description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[A Declaration made by the Earl of New-castle ... for his resolution of Marching into Yorkshire. As also a just vindication of himself from that ... aspersion laid upon him, for entertaining some Popish recusants in his forces.]" Author: CAVENDISH, William - Duke of Newcastle Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 1077.f.86." Page: 52 Place of Publishing: Newcastle Date of Publishing: 1843 Publisher: M. A. Richardson Edition: [Another edition.] Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000640331 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
